verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh the valleys shall ring
with the sound of praise
And the lion shall lie with the lamb
Of His government
there shall be no end
And His glory shall fill the earth

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
May your will be done
May your kingdom come
Let it rule, let it reign in our lives
There's a shout in the camp
As we answer the call,
Hail the King!
Hail the Lord of Lords!
